Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • Event

  • public class Event
extends java.lang.Object
    Foreign Crisis and Events that will necessitate a response from the player

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Event(java.lang.String type)
      Event(String) contructs Event objects, of _type type.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double[] changeResult(State usa, double worldStable, int choice)
      changeResult(State, double, int) generates the chnages that should occur to the input double worldStable and State usa, based upon the int choice the user has made.
      void initializeEvents()
      initializeEvents() populates the EVENT 2-D array with the possibilities for _text and _options[] that may be chosen.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      main(String[] args) tests the methods within the array by printing and constructing an Event object of type "Foreign"
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString() customizes the string output of the Event object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Event

        public Event(java.lang.String type)
        Event(String) contructs Event objects, of _type type. The _options and _text are randomly choosen from _EVENTS
        Parameters:
        type - This is String which defines the type of Event that is to be created, it may be either , letter for letter, Domestic or Foreign

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        toString() customizes the string output of the Event object
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The _text of the Event after a slight introductory string, then the options are returned numerically from least to greatest

      • changeResult

        public static double[] changeResult(State usa,
                    double worldStable,
                    int choice)
        changeResult(State, double, int) generates the chnages that should occur to the input double worldStable and State usa, based upon the int choice the user has made. The choice represents which of an events option the user choose, with the int corresponding to the option's index.
        Parameters:
        usa - The State object of the player who is responding to the events, must not be null
        worldStable - A double representing the worldStability variable within Driver.java, range == [0.0, 50.0]
        choice - int representing the index of the user's choice of response within _options instance variable
        Returns:
        double[] of length 2; double[0] is the change that should occur to usa's averageIncome with the choosen option. double[1] is the change that should occur to worldStability within Driver.java with the choosen option

      • initializeEvents

        public void initializeEvents()
        initializeEvents() populates the EVENT 2-D array with the possibilities for _text and _options[] that may be chosen.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        main(String[] args) tests the methods within the array by printing and constructing an Event object of type "Foreign"
        Parameters:
        args - Unused
